title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When using the new Date() as the content for three items, the dynamic text item displayed a different format compared to the data and text item.
EB: The dynamic text item, data item, and text item should all display the same format when using the new Date() as the content.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Input new Date() as the content for three items. 
2. Save and preview the items. 
Expected result: All three items should show the same format. 
Actual result: The dynamic text item displayed a different format compared to the data and text item.
